title: The protected occupiers shall be rehabilitated in situ and they will be allotted rehabilitation tenement free of cost
clause_text: The protected occupiers shall be rehabilitated in situ and they will be allotted rehabilitation tenement free of cost. However, in case the slum is situated on non-buildable area or the area under slum is required for any vital public project, then they will be rehabilitated by relocation. Such relocation shall be made on a land near the slum pocket as far as practicable, but within the same Municipal limit.
section: Provision relating to allotment of tenements either in situ or otherwise, on ownership free of cost to the protected occupiers

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
